item.title: Group B Twintania Kill
item.description: About damn time! Congratulations group B on your Twintania kill! Just in time for the new patch! Also, congratulations Kaoru on your new bow. Please don't fire it at Fura ; ;.

item.title: Group C Kills Twintania
item.description: Congratulations group C on your first kill, and Callie on his fists! Group B isn't far behind you!

item.title: Group Hodgepodge Twintania Kill
item.description:
Congratulations Kaoru, Hiro, Novaleigh, Drakeon, Yukkin, Callie, and Bruiser for your first T5 win!

Seriously, how did Bruiser get that goddamn axe?

item.title: Recorded Twintania Kill
item.description: Groups B, C, and D are all getting close to getting their first Twintania kills. As per their request, I recorded group A's latest Twintania kill for groups B-D to refer to as an extra resource. Please enable annotations for commentary. You can view it here.

item.title: Twintania on Farm
item.description: Group A has now one-shotted Twintania, and we can now declare T5 on farm. Raid week will therefore end on Monday, with Wednesdays set for other activities. Group B continues as scheduled.
